comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
Correct description is "Dam Square" (The caption in the print itself is "Amsterdam Dam"). the church on the left is "Nieuwe Kerk", not Cathedral. (Amsterdam has no cathedral.) See also the comment here:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/trialsanderrors/3298905795/]

comment.author: 10233859@N00
comment._content: This is indeed Dam Square. The statue on the Dam Square, torn down in 1914, was popularly referred to as Naatje van de Dam: nl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naatje_van_de_Dam
